flawed_nl_solution:
The total time we spent going to school is 15 minutes + 6 minutes = <<15+6=19>>19 minutes.
We have 30 minutes - 19 minutes = <<30-19=11>>11 minutes left not to be late.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
